article.title: FujiFilm Awarded Digital Imaging Funds
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: FujiFilm Medical Systems USA Inc., Stamford, Conn., has been awarded a maximum $98,024,868 modification exercising the first option year on a two year base contract with one two-year option and one, one-year option for digital imaging network-picture archive communication system. The modification is a fixed-price with economic-price-adjustment contract. The contracting activity is the Defense Logistics Agency Troop Support, Philadelphia, Pa.
